EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Sylvie Luanghy (1337004438.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sylvie Luanghy (1337004438.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Sylvie, Thank you for your follow up. There is not a monthly membership fee for our services. Our fee is taken off the top of your gross billings that come in through our system, so we only get paid when you get paid. There are not activation or early termination fees either. Our fee is 5.0% of the first $125,000 of cash receipts from Clients for services beginning on Effective Date and each anniversary thereafter. 1.5% after the first $125,000 of cash receipts from Clients with the Standard Associate Fee Plan until the anniversary of Effective Date. Basically, we give you a drop in fee within an anniversary year when you bill over $125,000 within that year, and it resets to 5% every year on your anniversary date. If you would like to hear more about the MBO services I would be happy to give you a call to find out if our program would be a good fit for you. You may schedule a time on my calendar by clicking here : https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK. I look forward to speaking with you soon! Thank you and have a great day,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sylvie I. Luanghy [mailto:sluanghy@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, May 14, 2012 8:32 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Sylvie Luanghy HI Nicolette,
I'm currently thinking of joining the MBO Partners program but I wanted to first clarify a few things:
Is there a monthly membership fee to join and if so what is the fee? Can you possibly email me all the fees associated with joining MBO Partners program?
Thanks
Sylvie
Subject: MBO Partners / Sylvie Luanghy Date: Fri, 27 Apr 2012 14:27:54 -0500 CC: To: sluanghy@hotmail.com <mailto:sluanghy@hotmail.com> From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>Dear Sylvie, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy, I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. Regards, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorEnrollment ManagerMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6281f: 703.793.6081e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>
